snippet: A man convicted of plotting to assassinate President Vladimir V. Putin during his recent re-election campaign was sentenced in Moscow on Tuesday to 10 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: A man convicted of plotting to assassinate President Vladimir V. Putin during his recent re-election campaign was sentenced in Moscow on Tuesday to 10 years in prison.

headline.main: Russia: Man Who Plotted to Kill Putin Is Sentenced
headline.print_headline: Russia: Man Who Plotted to Kill Putin Is Sentenced
